      • store

        public void store(java.lang.String filePath,
                  int index)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Writes the transformation to file in a format that could further be used in Sphinx3 and Sphinx4.
        Parameters:
        filePath - path to store transform matrix
        index - index of transform to store
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if something went wrong

      • update

        public void update(Stats stats)
        Stores in current object a transform generated on the provided stats.
        Parameters:
        stats - provided stats that were previously collected from Result objects.
